why: The three-tiered higher education levels ( Bachelor, Master and Doctoral) under Korean Education System are one of the finest education with respect to the standard of Alberta, Canada. The foundation courses like Certificates, Diplomas and short cycle associate courses also have a good hold in their quality of education and making paths for degree level programs in Korean Universities.
keyFeatures: Korean Universities(few) are among the top ranking Universities of the world.
Semester based education system with American credit system standards.
Short summer courses of 10-60 weeks semester programs at Korean Universities.
requirements: TOEFL 71 and IELTS 5.5 for undergraduate and Master's levels,TOEFL 79 and IELTS 6 for PhD level
Korean language minimum score level 3 in Test Proficiency in Korean (TOPIK).
Copies of academic transcript and character certificate
sponsor: Verification of business and income letter
Property valuation document documents required for issuing from 2-3 weeks of application date.
